price: Katakanlah, "Berjalanlah di (muka) bumi, maka perhatikanlah bagaimana Allah menciptakan (manusia) dari permulaannya, kemudian Allah menjadikannya sekali lagi 1148.  Sesungguhnya Allah Maha Kuasa atas segala sesuatu.
arabic: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ بَدَأَ ٱلۡخَلۡقَۚ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ يُنشِئُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
footnotes: 1148.  Maksudnya, Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā membangkitkan manusia sesudah mati kelak di akhirat.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul sīrū fī al-arḍi fa-unẓurū kayfa bada-a al-khalqa thumma al-lahu yunshi-u al-nashata al-ākhirata inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
